posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 安装 Ubuntu 18.04
posts.text: 安装 Ubuntu 18.041. Ubuntu时间和Windows不一致解决办法：在Ubuntu中把计算机硬件时间改成系统显示的时间，即禁用Ubuntu的UTC：（需要重启） 1timedatectl set-local-rtc 1 –adjust-system-clock 具体参见 解决Windows10与Ubuntu16.04双系统时间不一样问题 2. 更新 apt-get1sudo apt-get update 3. 安装 vim1sudo apt-get install vim 4. 安装 Nvidia 驱动 干掉 nouveau 12cd /etc/modprobe.d/ # 进入对应文件夹sudo vim blacklist-nouveau.conf 添加如下内容 1blacklist nouveau options nouveau modeset=0 重置内核引导 1sudo update-initramfs -u 重启 安装 Nvidia 驱动 软件和更新 –> 附加驱动
